item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 22, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Show HN: Rebels in the sky – Terminal game about space pirates (52 points | 26 comments)
3. Salmon return to lay eggs in historic habitat after dam removal project (110 points | 90 comments)

9. A “meta-optics” camera that is the size of a grain of salt (132 points | 83 comments)
10. Show HN: Llama 3.2 Interpretability with Sparse Autoencoders (476 points | 65 comments)

26. Why so many families are "drowning in toys" (23 points | 11 comments)

29. WhisperNER: Unified Open Named Entity and Speech Recognition (98 points | 12 comments)
